1b1(myang 'das): /rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya ma hA pa ri naiR+YA No nA ma sU tA/
1b2(myang 'das): bod skad du/'phags pa yongs su mya ngani las 'das pa chen po'i
1b3(myang 'das): mdo/bam po dang po//sangs rgyas drang byang chub sems dpa'
1b4(myang 'das): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa
2a1(myang 'das): //dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rna mchog gi grong khyer skyes bu stobs po che 'byung ba'i gnas klung
2a2(myang 'das): ri la ba de'i 'gram shing sA la drung gnyis kyi bar na/dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya stong phragri brgyad cu snyed kyis
2a3(myang 'das): yongs su bskor nas/mdun du bdar te thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpyid zla 'bring po'i chos
2a4(myang 'das): bco lnga'i nyin par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nye ba na/bcom ldan 'das kyi byini gyi rlabs kyis gsung
2a5(myang 'das): chen pos srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du kun tu khyab par sems can thams cad la so so'i skad du gsung 'di skad ces grags
2b1(myang 'das): par gyur to//deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bo mang po rnams la thugs brtse ba/sems can
2b2(myang 'das): thams cad kyi skyabs dang mgon du gyur pa/sems can thams cad la sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar mnyam par gzigs pa/sems
2b3(myang 'das): can gyi skyabs drang /dpung gnyen dang /rten dang /gnas su gyur pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'dra'o//so so'i skye bo dag the
2b4(myang 'das): chom dngo so ma nyir gyur pa yod na/da zhu zhing dri ba'i dus nang gi tha ma 'dir zhu zhing gsol cig ces pa'i gsung gis yongs su glags
2b5(myang 'das): pur gyur to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi che zhal gyi sgo na sru 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs bkye ba ni 'di lta ste/sngon po dang //
2b6(myang 'das): ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /shel lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /phyogs bcu'i
3a1(myang 'das): /na//'jig rten gyi khams ky-i b+hu du yongs su snang bar byas nas/de dag nu gunas d+ma'i lum+b+ha rgyud drug sems can
3a2(myang 'das): drag 'od zer des reg ma thag tu kha na ma tho ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar gyur to//de'i tshe so so'i skye bo dag de lta bu'i lhas mthong
3a3(myang 'das): zhing thos nas mya ngan chen pos yid gdungs te/dus gcig tu chonges rdung zhing ngus nas 'di skad du/e mo'o shin tu byams pa'i pha mar
3a4(myang 'das): gyur pa/kyi hud kyi hung mya ngan las 'das sam zhes smras nas thal mos mgo dang brang la rdebs te tshe de rdung ngo //kha tsog ni lus kyang rab tu
3a5(myang 'das): 'dar zhing ba spu kun langs nas skad kyis brnangs pa tsami du ngus so//dri'i tshe na sa chen po 'dri dang /ri dang rgya mtsho'ang rab tu g.yos shing
3a6(myang 'das): 'khrugs so//de nas sems can de dag gcig la gcig spro bsring zhing mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir 'di skad du/kye grogs po dag mya ngan
3b1(myang 'das): ma byed par myur du rtswa mchog gi grong khyer skyes bu stobs po che 'byung ba'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la
3b2(myang 'das): mgo bos phyag btsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan lngas mi 'da' bar 'jig rten na bskal pa gcig gama?/bskal pa gcig 'gribs kyi bar
3b3(myang 'das): du bzhugs par gsol du 'deng ngo zhes smras so//la la ni gcig gi lag pa la gcig gis 'jus nas 'di skad du 'jig rten stongs te/sems can gyi bsod
3b4(myang 'das): nams zad pas mi dge ba'i las 'jig rten du byung bar gyur gyis/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
3b5(myang 'das): gshegs nges kyis/bdag cag myur du 'ding ngo zhes smra'o//lA la ni 'di skad du 'jig rten stongs so//'jig rten stongs so//bdag cag la dang slan chad ni mgon
3b6(myang 'das): dang skyabs med de/dbul phongs par gyur to//deng kho nar bla na med pa'i bcom ldan 'das dang yongs su bral bas nga slan chud som nyi dang the tshom za bye su la zhu zhes
3b7(myang 'das): smra'o//de'i tshe na tshad med pa'i nye gnas chen po che dang ldan pa kAd+hA ya na chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa bku la dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa
4a1(myang 'das): /dge slong chen po de dag kyang /sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rig pas lus kun 'dar zhing mi bzod pa tsam du rab tu g.yos te/sems kyang myos nas
4a2(myang 'das): chongs 'debs shing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis non par gyur to//de'i tshe gzhan yang dge slong brgya stong phrag brgyad cu snad thams cad kyang dgra bcom
4a3(myang 'das): pA/sems kyi dbang du gyur pa/bya ba byas pa/nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa/dbang po thams cad rab tu dul ba/klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar mthu cheg stong
4a4(myang 'das): ba'i shes rab dang ldan pa/phyis brodag gi don rab tu rnyed pa/tsan+dan gyi tshal ltar tsan+dan gyis yongs su bskor ba/seng ge'i rgyal po ltar seng gis yongs su
4a5(myang 'das): bskor ba/de lta bu'i tshad med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa sha stag go//de dag kyang snga dro nyi ma shar ma thag tu gnas
4a6(myang 'das): nas byung ste/so shing 'cha' ba na sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du grogs po dag myur du kha lag khrus shig ces smras so//de skad ces
4a7(myang 'das): smras mi thag du lus kyi ba spu kun langs nas/lus la khyab par khrag rgyas pa ni me tog pa la shi lta bur gyur te/mig mchi mas gang nas sdug bsngal chen po myong
4b1(myang 'das): bar gyur to//de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang badre ba'i don gyi phyir/theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyidi la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/
4b2(myang 'das): de bzhin gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te/gsungs pa dag bstan pa'i phyir/rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad
4b3(myang 'das): yongs su gdul ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der myur du dong nas spyi bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te/lan brgya stong du bskor nus thal mo sbyar
4b4(myang 'das): te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang kun+da la'i bu mo dge slong ma dpal bzang dang /dge slong ma bsnyon dga' ma dang /dge slong ma rgya mtsho'i blo gros la sogs
4b5(myang 'das): te/dge slong ma khri phrag drug cu snyed thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/sems kyi dbang du gyur pa/bya ba byas pa/nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa//
4b6(myang 'das): dbang po rab tu dul ba/klu chen po ltar gzi brjid rab tu che ba/stong pa nyid kyi shes rab dang ldan pa sha stag ste/de dag kyang snga dro'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma thog mar shar ba na/lus
4b7(myang 'das): kyi ba spu kun spyi bung zhes byed nas lus la khyab par khrag gis rgyas pa ni me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur te/mig mchi mas yongs su gang nas sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur
5a1(myang 'das): to//de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/de bzhin
5a2(myang 'das): gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs pa dag bstan pa'i phyir/rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad yongs su gdul
5a3(myang 'das): ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der myur du dong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/lan brgya stong du bskor nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
5a4(myang 'das): do//dge slong ma de dag gi nang na dge slong ma kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/mi'i nang na klu lta bu sa bcu rab tu non pa/mi g.yo ba la gnas pa/sems can
5a5(myang 'das): gdul ba'i phyir bud med kyi lus ston kyang rtag tu tshad med pa bzhi la nan tan byed pa/sems kyi dbang du gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi skur yang sprul pa sha stag go//de'i tshe gzhan
5a6(myang 'das): yang klung gang+gA gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i nang na klu lta bu sa bcu rab tu non pa/mi g.yo ba la rab tu gnas pa/thabs kyis lus
5a7(myang 'das): ston pa sha stig la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i dpal dang /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la sogs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5b1(myang 'das): chen po de dag gis thog mar drangs nas thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la bkur sti byed pa/theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa/theg pa chen po la shin tu mkhas pa/theg pa chen po
5b2(myang 'das): la shin tu mos pa/theg pa chen po la shin tu bsrung ba/'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyi sems dang sbyor ba/ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ma grol ba grol bar yi dam 'cha' ba/
5b3(myang 'das): 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du tshul khrims yongs su bsrungs pa/spyod pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ma grol ba grol bar byed pa/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
5b4(myang 'das): rgyun mi 'chad par 'tsho ba pa/ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba/rgyan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa de lta bu'i yon tan chad med pa dang ldan pa//sems
5b5(myang 'das): can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar lta ba sha stag go/de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma shar ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg ma thag tu lus kyi ba spu kun langs te/lus
5b6(myang 'das): la khyab par khrag gis rgyas pa ni ji ltar me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur te/mig mchi mas yongs su gang nas sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to//de dag kyang sems can thams
5b7(myang 'das): cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir theg pa chen po don dam pa'i stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bsgrub pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pas thabs su dgongs te gsungs pa bstan
6a1(myang 'das): ba'i phyir/rnam pa sna tshogs su chos ston pa rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir/sems can thams cad yongs su gdul ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
6a2(myang 'das): myur du dong nas phyin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan brgya stong du bskor te/thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang dang bces pas phyogs gcig
6a3(myang 'das): tu 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gaung+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi dge bsnyen pha khrims lnga yongs su bsrung ba la 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen gzi brjid dri ma med par grags
6a4(myang 'das): pa'i rgyal po dang /dge bsnyen legs pa'i yon tan la sogs pas thog mar drangs te/thams cad kyang gnyen por gyur pa'i chos la shin tu mos pa ni 'di lta ste/sdug
6a5(myang 'das): bsngal dang bde ba dang /rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang /yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa dang /bdag dang bdag med pa dang /nges pa dang ma nges pa dang /skyabs su
6a6(myang 'das): 'gro ba dang skyabs su mi 'gro ba dang /sems can drang sems can ma yin pa dang /ther zug dang ther zug ma yin pa dang /bde ba dang bde ba ma yin pa dang /'dus byas
6a7(myang 'das): dang 'dus ma byas pa dang /chad pa dang chad pa ma yin pa dang /mya ngan las 'da' ba dang mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin pa dang /lhag pa dang lhag pa ma yin pa la
6b1(myang 'das): sogs te/gnyen por gyur pa'i chos 'di dag la rtag par shin tu mos pa sha stag go/gzhan yang bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po lnga thos par mos pa/ji ltar thos pa bzhin du
6b2(myang 'das): gzhan la'ang ston nus pa/tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/theg pa chen po la sgom pas gdungs pa ltar mos pa bdag kyang shin tu ngoms la/skom pas gdungs pa gzhan
6b3(myang 'das): yang ngoms par byed pa/bla na med pa'i ye shes la shin tu 'jug pa/theg pa chen po la shin tu mos pa/theg pa chen po la shin tu bsrung ba/'jig rten po thams cad
6b4(myang 'das): kyi sems dang shin tu sbyor ba/ma rgal ba sgrol ba/ma grol ba 'grol ba/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshob pa/mi 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo shin
6b5(myang 'das): tu bskor ba/rgyan chen pos rnam par brgyan pa/sems shin tu zab mo'i ro la mos pa/tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/thams cad kyang de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa/sems
6b6(myang 'das): can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed cing bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar gnyis su med par snyoms pa sha stag go//de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi me shar ma thag tu 'od zer
6b7(myang 'das): gyis reg nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bur zhugs la bzhin pa'i phyir thams cad kyis so so nas spos kyi shing khri phrag du ma bshams pa la 'di lta ste/spos kyi shing tsan+dan dang /
7a1(myang 'das): a ga ru dang /go shiR+Sha tsan+dan dang /lha'i shing bsung can la sogs pa'o//shing de dag kyang mdzes pa'i ri mo dang ldan zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis rnam
7a2(myang 'das): par brgyan pa/'od shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal ba ni dper na ri mo mkhan gyis tshon sna tshogs bkye ba dang 'dra ste/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od kha dog sngon po dang /ser
7a3(myang 'das): po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang ldan te/'gro ba mang pos mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ba sha stag go/shing rnam pa mang po de dag la gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spos
7a4(myang 'das): kyi lde gu dang /gur gum dang /a ga ru dang /pog la sogs pas yongs su bskus la/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtor cing brgyan pa ni 'di lta ste/me tog ut+pa la
7a5(myang 'das): dang /me tog ku mu da dang /me tog pad+mo dang /me tog puN+Da ri ka la sogs pa'o//shing de dag la gzhin yang tshon rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i ba dan shin tu 'jam zhing
7a6(myang 'das): mdzes pa yongs su sbyangs pa ni dper na lha'i na bza' ke'u sha ya 'am/shu ma lta bu'o//spos kyi shing de dag kyang rin po che'i shing rtas bskyas te/rin po che'i shing rta de dag
7a7(myang 'das): las kyang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs byung ba ni 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po'o//shing rta'i gnya' shing dang /bar gdang la sogs pa'ang rin
7b1(myang 'das): po che sna bdun gyis rnam par spras te/shing rta de re re la'ang rta bzhi bzhis drangs so//rta de dag kyang mgyogs khyad rlung dang 'dra'o/shing rta de re re'i mdun nA rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal
7b2(myang 'das): mtshan lnga bcu snyed dngar te/gser gyi dra bas bla res bres so//rin po che'i shing rta de re re'i steng steng yang rin po che'i gdugs lnga bcu snyed bris so/shing rta de re ri la'ang me tog
7b3(myang 'das): gi phreng ba spangs pa ni 'di lta ste/me tog ut+pa la dang /me tog ku mu da dang /me tog pad+mo dang /puN+Da ri ka rnams te/'dab ma ni gser/ge sar ni rdo rje las byas te/me tog
7b4(myang 'das): ge sar de dag gi nang na'ang bung ba nag po lding zhing rtse'o//gzhan yang sgra skad mang po snyan pa dang /de ma yin pa mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa nyid dang /bdag
7b5(myang 'das): med pa'i sgra'ang 'byin to/de dag las gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon sprad pa spyod pa'i sgra dang /gzhan yang rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra grag pa ni 'di lta ste/glu dang /
7b6(myang 'das): gar dang /gling bu dang /dgu po rgyud mang dang /se'u dang shir dang /rnga'i sgo rnams so//rol mo'i sgra de las gzhan yang 'di skad du kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten stongs so zhes
7b7(myang 'das): zer ba'i sgra'ang byung ngo //shing rta de re re'i mdun na/dge bsnyen rin po che sna bzhi'i khri'u thogs pa re re yod de/khri'u de'i steng na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog spungs pa ni 'di lta ste/
8a1(myang 'das): me tog ut+pa la dang /ku mu da dang /pad+mo dang puN+Da ri ka dang /gur gum dang /byug spos dang /bdug spos la sogs pa mchog tu gyur phul du gyur pa
8a2(myang 'das): rnams bshams so//dge bsnyen rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la bsod snyoms rnam pa sna tshogs bshams pa'ang thams cad tsan+dan dang /a ga ru'i shing bsung can
8a3(myang 'das): bsregs te/yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu las g.yos su byas so//zhal zas de dag kyang ro rnam pa drug dang ldan no//'di lta ste kha ba dang /sgyur ba dang /mngar ba
8a4(myang 'das): dang /tsha ba dang /lan cha bro ba dang /mngal ba'i ro dang ldan no//gzhan yang yon tan rnam pa gsum drang ldan te/munyan zhing 'jam pa dang /gtsang ba dang /chos bzhin
8a5(myang 'das): byas pa'o//de lta bu la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas/stobs po che 'byung ba'i gnas sA la'i shing drung du lhags so//gzhan yang gser gyi bye
8a6(myang 'das): mas sa gzhir bdal te/lha'i na bza' ka tsi lin+d+ra dang /kham pa la dang /dar gyis de'i steng du bting ba ni kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis tshun chad yog par byas
8a7(myang 'das): so//sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri bshams te/khri de dag kyang 'phang du mtho khyad ri rab lhun po dang mnyam mo/khri de dag gi
8b1(myang 'das): sbyostong na rin po che'i gur byab nas do shal rnam pa mang po sbyangs so//sA la'i shing de dag la'ang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bya ngan spyangs te/gdugs byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spros
8b2(myang 'das): bsung can gyi lde gus shing de dag la bslus so//shing gi bAr yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chali par bkang ngo //dge bsnyen de rnams so so nas yid la 'di snyam du sems
8b3(myang 'das): so//so so'i skye bro dag gal te bza' bos brel na bza' ba byin no//btung bas brel ba la btung ba/mgo 'dod pa rnams la mgo/mig 'dod pa rnams la mig/de ltar
8b4(myang 'das): so so'i skye bo dag ci 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin pa thams cad byin tAM/sbyin pa de'ang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /rnyog pa'i sems med do//de las gzhan pa
8b5(myang 'das): 'jig rten gyi longs spyod kyi phyir bsam pa'i sems med kyi bla ni med po yongs su dag pa'i byang chub 'ba' zhig gi phyir ro//dge bsnyen de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub la bde bar
8b6(myang 'das): gnas nas yang 'di snyam du sems so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag gi mchod pa 'di bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam bsems nas/de dag gi lus kyi ba
8b7(myang 'das): spu kun langs te/lus khrag gis rgyas pa ni me tog pa la sha lta bur gyur/mchi mas ni mig gang /sdug bsngal chen pos ni yid gdungs par gyur te/so so nas mchod
9a1(myang 'das): pa'i yo byad bshams pa spos kyi shing dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs dang /zhal zas rnams rin po che'i shing rtas bskyas nas sangs rgyas gang
9a2(myang 'das): na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod do//lan brgya stong du bskor
9a3(myang 'das): nas skad phyung ste ngus so//ngu ba'i sgras gnam sa'ang g.yos so//brang rdung zhing cho nges 'debs te/mchi ma char bzhin du zags nas/gcig la gcig 'di skad du kyi hud kyi
9a4(myang 'das): dud grogs po dag 'jig rten stongs so//'jig rten stongs so zhes smras nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lus brdabs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
9a5(myang 'das): to//de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi mchod pa bshams pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cang mi
9a6(myang 'das): gsung ste ma bzhes nas/de bzhin du ldan gsum gyi bAr du gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang ngo //dge bsnyen de dag bsam pa bzhin du ma gyur nas/mya ngan gyis yid
9a7(myang 'das): gdungs te/cang mi smra bar 'khod pa ni dper na pha ma shin tu byams pa'i bu gcig pa glo bur du nad kyis btab ste tshe 'phos nas dur du bskyal te/shin tu mya ngan gyis yid
9b1(myang 'das): gdungs pa dang 'dra bar dge bsnyen de dag kyang mya ngan gyis yid gdungs pa'ang de dang 'dra ste/mchod pa'i yo byad rnams gnas gcig tu bzhag nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi
9b2(myang 'das): smra bar 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gaung+gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi dge bsnyen ma khrims lnga yongs su bsrung ba/spyod lam dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/dge bsnyen ma 'tsho
9b3(myang 'das): ba'i yon tan dang /dge bsnyen ma dpal gyi phreng ba dang /dge bsnyen ma byi sha ka la sogs pas thog ma drangs nas dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed thams cad kyang dam
9b4(myang 'das): pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/sems can tshad med pa brgya stong gdul ba'i phyir bud med kyi lus su ston cing khyim gyi chos yongs su smod pa/bdag gi lus la sbrul gdug
9b5(myang 'das): pa bzhi dang 'dra bar rtogs pa/lus la rtag tu srin bu grangs med pas za ba dang /lus 'di la shin tu btsog pa dang /'dod pas yongs su bcings par rtogs pa/lus
9b6(myang 'das): 'di la khyi ro dang 'dra bar 'jigs su rung ba dang /lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/bu ga dgu nas rtag tu zag par rtogs pa/lus 'di ni mkhar dang 'dra ste/sha dang pags
9b7(myang 'das): pa dang rtsa dang rgyus pas rnam par dkris pa/lag pa dang rkang pa ni mkhar gyi nyen lta bur gyur pa/mig ni skar khung lta bur gyur pa/mgo ni khang pa lta bur gyur te/sems
10a1(myang 'das): rgyal po dang 'dra ba de'i nang na gnas par rtogs pa/lus mkhar dang 'dra ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su spangs te/bus pa so//
10a2(myang 'das): so'i skye bo dag ni de la chags par byed do//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi srin po gnas par rtogs pa/lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/'dam bu'i myu gu 'am/
10a3(myang 'das): e rat+no 'am/chu'i chu bur rAm/chu shing lta bur rtogs pa/lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/skad cig skad cig tu 'pho zhing dper na glog gi 'od dam/gzar po'i chu 'am/sgyu ma
10a4(myang 'das): 'am/smig rgyu 'am/chu la ri mo bris pa lta bur rtogs pa/lus 'di ni 'gyur zhing 'pho ba ste/dper na chu 'gram g.yang sa'i sdong po lta bur rtogs pa lus 'di ni ring por mi thogs pa
10a5(myang 'das): ste/spying ki dang /'phar ba dang /srin bya dang /'ug pa dang /bya rgod dang /khA dang s+ya ka dang /khyi ltogs pa'i gzan du 'gyur te/'di la mkhas pa shes rab can su zhig
10a6(myang 'das): myos shong chags par byed snyam du rtogs pa/ba rmig gi nang du rgyo mtsho chen po'i chu blugs kyang bzod kyi lus 'di mi rtag pa dang /mi gtsang ba dang /btsog pa ni brjod sla ba ma
10a7(myang 'das): yin par rtogs pa/sa chen po 'di rgya shug tsam du dril tam/chung ngu na yungs kar gyi 'bru 'am/rdul phra mor gse ba ni sla'i/lus 'di'i nyes pa'i skyon brjod pa ni
10b1(myang 'das): sla ba ma yin par rtogs pa/de bas na mchil ma dang 'dra bar yongs su spangs nas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis dge bsnyen ma rnams stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
10b2(myang 'das): pa'i chos la rtag tu nan tan byed pa/theg pa chen po'i mdo sde nyan cing 'dzin pa la mos pa/thos nas kyang gzhan la rgya cher ston nus pa/sngon gyi smon lam yongs su 'dzin
10b3(myang 'das): pa/bud med kyi lus la shin tu spyod pa/shin tu skyon che bar shes pa/snying po med par rtogs pa/sems rtag tu rnal 'byor du spyad pa/de bzhin du yang dag par rtog cing
10b4(myang 'das): mtha' med par 'khor ba'i rgyun yongs su gcod pa/theg pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar mos pa/bdag shin tu ngoms pas gzhan yang shin tu ngoms par byed pa/
10b5(myang 'das): theg pa chen po la rab tu mos pa/theg pa chen po la shin tu bsrung ba/bud med kyi lus su ston kyang yang dag par byang chub sems dpa' sha stag ste/thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi
10b6(myang 'das): bsam pa dang shin tu sbyor ba/mya rgal ba sgrol ba/ma grol ba 'grol ba/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tshob pa/ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo
10b7(myang 'das): bskor bar 'gyur ba/rgyan chen pos yongs su brgyan pa/tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/de lta bu'i yon tan chad med pa dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la snying rje'i
11a1(myang 'das): sems bskyed cing bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar gnyis su med par mnyam pa sha stag go/de dag kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma thog ma shar ba na 'od kyis reg nas gcig
11a2(myang 'das): la gcig 'di skad du deng ni shing sA la drung gnyis kyi drung du 'deng ngo zhes smras so//dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa snga ma bas byed kyis bzang bar
11a3(myang 'das): sbyar te/sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te/lan brgya stong bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
11a4(myang 'das): ljon 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun du bcas pa la mchod po'i yo byad bshams pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig ces
11a5(myang 'das): gsol to//de la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo //dge bsnyen ma rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig
11a6(myang 'das): tu 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi li tsa bI'i bu grong khyer yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang /chung
11a7(myang 'das): ma dang /'khor rnams dang /gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi rgyal rigs su gtogs pa rgyal po'i 'khor dang bcas te/thams cad kyang chos 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims
11b1(myang 'das): yongs su bsrung ba/spyod lam dang ldan pa/slob pa gzhan la zhugs shing dam pa'i chos la sun 'byin pa shin tu tshar gcod pa sha stag gcig la gcig 'di skad ces dam
11b2(myang 'das): 'cha'o//bdag cag gser dang /dngul dang /rin po che'i gter mdzod lta bur yang dag pa'i chos shin tu zab mo bdud rtsi lta bur zad mi shes pa yun du 'jig rten na gnas
11b3(myang 'das): par byas te/bdag cag kyang de dag la rtag tu nan tan du spyod par gyur cig/gal te zhal nas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos la dbang za zhing /skur ba zhig yod na bdag cag
11b4(myang 'das): gris de'i lce bcad do zhes dam bcas shing /gzhan yong khyim nas khyim ma yin par rab tu byung ba dag/tshul khrims las nyams par gyur na bdag cag gis khyim par phab
11b5(myang 'das): ste las byed du gzhug go zhes pa dang /gal te dam pa'i chos la nan tan du byed na bdag cag gas pa ma dang 'dra bar rim gro dang bkur sti bya'o zhes pa dang /gal te dge 'dun
11b6(myang 'das): las dam pa'i chos la nan tan du spyod pa zhig yod na bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang zhing de la mthu'ang sbyin par bya'o zhes du mi bcas pa/rtog tu theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thos par
11b7(myang 'das): mos shing /thos nas kyang gzhan la rgyas par ston pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/li tsa bI'i bu rnam dag dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /lai tsa bI'i bu
12a1(myang 'das): bag yod rnam par dag pa dang /li tsa bI'i bu rtag tu dri med rnam dag yon tan la sogs te/de dag gcig lnga gcig 'di skad du kye grogs po dag myur bar de
12a2(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der song ste mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod du 'dong ngo //de nas li tsa bI de dag re res kyang bal glang brgyad khri bzhi stong
12a3(myang 'das): dang /rin po che'i shing rta rta bzhi dang bcas pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /gzhan yang shing tsan+dan dang /A ga ru
12a4(myang 'das): sbaskams pa brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed bshams te/bal glang de re ro'i mdun na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs kyang bshams so//gdugs nang gi chung
12a5(myang 'das): du'ang kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig khobs so/ba dan nang gi thung ngu'ang ring khyad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis so//rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang gi chung ba'ang mtho
12a6(myang 'das): khyad dpag tshad brgya pa ste/de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad bshams nas sangs rgyas gong na bar lhags te phyin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan
12a7(myang 'das): brgya stong du bskor te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa'i
12b1(myang 'das): yo byad 'di dag 'bul na de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to//de la de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung
12b2(myang 'das): nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo //li tsa bI'i bu rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas shin tu mya ngan gyis non te/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa las shing ta la
12b3(myang 'das): bdun srid du 'phags nas steng gi nam mkha' la cang mi smra bar 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi blon po chen po dang /khyim bdag dang /tshong dpon theg
12b4(myang 'das): pa chen po la shin tu mos pas slob pa gzhan la zhugs pa gang zhig yang dag pa'i chos la smod pa zhig yong ni/de dag gi mthus thul ba ni ji ltar rtswa dang sha de la ser ba bab pa lta
12b5(myang 'das): bu sha stag la 'di lta ste/tshong dpon nyi ma'i 'od dang /tshong dpon 'jig rten skyong dang /tshong dpon chos skyong la sogs pas thog ma drangs te/de dag gis so so nas mchod
12b6(myang 'das): pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni snga ma bas lnga 'gyur tsam bshams te/shing sA la drung gnyis kyi bar gang na bar song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
12b7(myang 'das): phyag btsal nas lan brgya stong du bskor te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun
13a1(myang 'das): rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad 'di dag 'bul na bzhes shig ces gsol to//de la de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang ngo //
13a2(myang 'das): tshong dpon de dag bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa las shing ta la bdun srid du
13a3(myang 'das): 'phags nas steng gi nam mkha' la cang mi smra bar 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal po btsun mo dang slas su bcas pa/gzhan yang rngom+bu gling
13a4(myang 'das): na rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs par rgyal phran de ma yin pa thams cad dang /grong khyer dang /ljongs dang /grong 'dab thams cad kyi mi thams cad dang bcas pa la
13a5(myang 'das): 'di lta ste/rgyal po zla 'od dri med rgyal po la stsogs pas thog myur drangs nas so so nas dmag rnam bzhi dang bcas te/sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags so//rgyal po
13a6(myang 'das): de dag re re'ang 'khor khri phrag brgyad cu dang bcas so//dmag gi tshogs kyang bal glang dang rta pa ste/bal glang de dag kyang mche ba drug dang ldan la/rta rnams kyang mgyogs
13a7(myang 'das): khyad rlung bzhin te/mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa'ang snga ma bas drug 'gyur gyis lhag go/rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang chu zheng kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad
13b1(myang 'das): brgyad khebs so//ba dan nang gi thung ngu'ang ring khyad dpag tshad bcu drug snyed do//rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang gi chung ngu'ang mtho khyad dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug go//rgyal po
13b2(myang 'das): de dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i chos la gnas pas log pa'i chos kun la shin tu smod pa/theg pa chen po la bkur sti byed pa/theg pa chen po la shin tu moso pa/
13b3(myang 'das): sems can thams cad la bu gcig dang 'dra bar byams pa/zhal zas bshams pa'i dri'ang dpag tshad bzhi'i bar du bro ba bshoms nus snga dro'i dus kyi tshe mchod pa'i yo byad
13b4(myang 'das): rnam pa sna tshogs thogs te/shing sA la drung gnyis kyi bar de bzhin gshegs pa gang ni bzhugs pa der song nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
13b5(myang 'das): to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa 'di dag 'bul na de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse ba'i slad du
13b6(myang 'das): bdag gi mchod paM nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas bzhes su ma gnang ngo //rgyal po de dag kyang bsams pa bzhin
13b7(myang 'das): du ma gyur pas shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs par gyur te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA bdun gyi bye mo skyed kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams
14a1(myang 'das): tshogs te/de la gcig ma gtogs pa ni ma skyes dgu'i btsun mo 'ba' zhig sems can gdul ba'i phyir bud med kyi lus su ston te/rtag tu lus
14a2(myang 'das): kyis nan tan du spyod cing stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos la sems 'dris shing goms par byed pa de la sogs te/btsun mo khams
14a3(myang 'das): gsum bzang mo dang /btsun mo 'dod pa'i yon tan la sngogs pas thog mar drangs so//thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos lo gnas shing tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/
14a4(myang 'das): spyod lam dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad la bu gcig dang 'dra bar byams pa sha stag go/de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'di skad du bdag cag kyang myur bar sangs
14a5(myang 'das): rgyas gang na bzhugs par 'deng ngo zhes smras so//rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni sna ma bas bdun 'gyur gyis lhag ste/me tog dang //
14a6(myang 'das): spos dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /dar gyi ba dan dang /gdugs dang /zhal zas mchog rnams so//rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang chu zheng kho ra khor yug tu
14a7(myang 'das): dpag tshad bcu drug khebs so//ba dan nang gi thung ngu'i tshad kyang dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug snyed do//rin po che'i rgyal mtshan nang gi dma' ba'i tshad kyang dpag tshad drug
14b1(myang 'das): cu rtsa brgyad snyed do//zhal zas kyi dri bsung gis kyang dpag tshad brgyad kyi bar du bye ba mchod pa'i yo byad de lta bu dag bshams nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin
14b2(myang 'das): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan brgya stong du ma bskor te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
14b3(myang 'das): gis sangs rgyas dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te 'bul ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod
14b4(myang 'das): pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo //de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo
14b5(myang 'das): rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas shin tu mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/skra 'bal zhing brang la thal mos rdebs te cho nges rdung ba ni ji ltar bu'i nang na sdug pa shi ba dang
14b6(myang 'das): 'dra bar gyur nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi lha'i bu mo rnams la 'di lta ste/lha'i bu mo yangs pa'i mig ces
14b7(myang 'das): bya bas thog mar drangs nas 'di skad ces smras so//kye grogs mo dag mthong ngam ltos shig/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang pos mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs
15a1(myang 'das): bshams nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul ba mthong ngam/bdag cag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad ba shams te/de bzhin
15a2(myang 'das): gshegs pa la mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes pa'i 'og tu mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o//kye grogs mo dag sangs rgyas
15a3(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pa'ang shin tu dka'/mchod pa nang gi tha ma bshams te 'bul ba'ang shin tu dka'o//gal te bcom ldan 'das mya
15a4(myang 'das): ngan las 'das na 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so//lha'i bu mo de rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'dod pa/theg pa chen po thos par mos pa/thos nas kyang gzhan
15a5(myang 'das): la rgya cher ston nus pa/theg pa chen po la skom pas gdungs pa ltar gyur cing /bdag shin tu ngoms pa ltar skom pas gdungs pa gzhan dag kyang ngoms par byed pa
15a6(myang 'das): theg pa chen po la skyob pa/slob pa gzhan la zhugs pa dag theg pa chen po la sun 'byin cing phrag dog byed pa yod na ji ltar rtswa la ser ba bab pa bzhin du shin tu thul
15a7(myang 'das): ba/tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba/spyod lam dang ldan pa/'jig rten thams cad kyi yid dang sbyor ba la shin tu mkhas pa/ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba/ma grol
15b1(myang 'das): ba rnams 'grol bar byed pa/phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'tsho ba pa/theg pa chen po la nan tAn byed/
15b2(myang 'das): cing rgan chen pos shin tu brgyan pa/de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa/sems can thams cud lnga 'ong bu gcig dang 'dra bar byams pa sha stug ste/de dag
15b3(myang 'das): kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma thog mA shwar ba na so so nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha'i shing bsung can bshams pa ni mi'i shing bsung can las khyad par du gyur pa shing grwa bsung nges
15b4(myang 'das): mi'i 'jig rten na mA nam zhing dri mi zhim pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa/shing rta dkar po la gdugs dkar po bres te rta dkar po bzhis drangs pa/shing rta de re re'i steng yang gur
15b5(myang 'das): dkar po dub la gur gyi mtha' ma'ang gser gyi dril bu sbyangs pa/rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spros dang /me tog dang /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs dang /zhal
15b6(myang 'das): zas mchog dam pa dang /rol mo'i rnam pa sna tshogs bshams te/seng ge'i gdan bting ngo //seng ge'i gdun gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang bai DUn+ya mthon mthing las byas pa/
15b7(myang 'das): de'i rgyab ni rin po che sna bdun gyi snam rten dang bcas pa/mdun yang gser las byas pa'i sngas re re yod pa/rin po che sna bdun gyi sgron ma'i sdong po la nor bu rin po che rnam
16a1(myang 'das): pa sna tshogs kyi sgron ma snang ba/sa gzhi thams cad lha'i me tog gis chal par bkod pa de lta bu dag lha'i bu mo de dag gis bshams nas yid gdung zhing
16a2(myang 'das): mchi ma zags te sdug bsngal chen po skyes kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir theg pa chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan par bya ba dang /de bzhin
16a3(myang 'das): gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa mngon du bstan pa dang /chos rnam pa sna tshogs smra ba rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gang na ba re lhagaso nas bcom ldan
16a4(myang 'das): 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te lan brgya stong du bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i
16a5(myang 'das): slad du mchod pa bshoms pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhos shig ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo //lha'i
16a6(myang 'das): bu mo rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA dgu'i bye ma snyed
16a7(myang 'das): kyi klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa la 'di lta ste/klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /klu'i rgyal po nyer dga' bo li sogs pas thog mar
16b1(myang 'das): drangs nas/klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang snga dro'i dus nyi ma thog ma shar ba na lha dang mi las lhag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad ba shams nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te
16b2(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas ldan brgya stong du bskor te/bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la
16b3(myang 'das): thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nong gi tho ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang ngo //de nas
16b4(myang 'das): klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi gnod sbyin
16b5(myang 'das): gyi rgyal po ngal bsos po la sogs pas thog mar drangs nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du kye skyes bu dag myur bar sangs rgyas gang na ba de 'dang ngo zhes smras nas mchod pa'i
16b6(myang 'das): yo byad klu bas lhag par bshams te/bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyog btsal te lan brgya stong du ma bskor nas bcom
16b7(myang 'das): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa bshams pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//
17a1(myang 'das): de la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas bzhes su ma gnang ngo //gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid//
17a2(myang 'das): gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po pas rgol ba bcom pa zhes bya bas thog mar drangs
17a3(myang 'das): so//gzhon yang klung gang+gA sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyi dri za'i rgyal po mthu bo ches thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang klung gang+gA bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi mi 'am ci'i rgyal po shin
17a4(myang 'das): tu mthong ba zhes bya bas thog mur drangs so//gzhan yang klang gang+gA lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba chen po zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so//
17a5(myang 'das): gzhan yang klung gaung+gA drug cu'i bye ma snyed kyi lha ma yin gyi rgyal po khab bi lis thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang klung gang+gA bdun cu'i bye ma snyed kyi ta na pa'i rgyal po dri med
17a6(myang 'das): 'bab chu dang /ba tI da ta lA sogs pas thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang klung gang+gA brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed kyi srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya bso thog mar drangs
17a7(myang 'das): so//de dag kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i sems yongs su spangs nas mi la mi za ba dang /dgra dang 'khon du gyur pa la byams shing snying rje'i sems skyo ba dang /gzugs
17b1(myang 'das): mi sdug pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad bzang zhing sdug par gyur to//gzhan yang klung gang+gA dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi nags tshal la dbang ba'i lha dri bsung la dga'
17b2(myang 'das): ba zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang klung gang+gA stong gi bye ma snyed kyi rig 'dzin kyi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po zhes bya bas thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang klung gang+gA
17b3(myang 'das): 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi mdangs za ba'i rgyal po shin tu mthong ba zhes bya bos thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang krung gang+gA khri phrag brgyu'i bye ma snyed kyi lha'i bu mo 'dod chags canA
17b4(myang 'das): lan pa dang /ur pa shi dang /to lo tsam dang /phyir sha kau la sogs pas thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang klung ged+b+ha khri phrag stong gi bye mA snyed kyi sa la gnas pa'i yi
17b5(myang 'das): dgas kyi rgyal po gzhog dkar bya bas thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang klung gang+gA 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi lha'i sras po rnams dang /lha'i rgyal po la phyogs bzhi'i
17b6(myang 'das): mgon pos thog mar drangs so//gzhan yang klung gang+gA 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi klung gi lhas ni phyogs bzhi nas sa las skyes pa'i me tog dus dang dus ma yin pa rnams
17b7(myang 'das): sA la'i shing drung du chal bar bkang ngo //gzhan yang klung gang+gA 'bum phrag bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rlung dang char la dbang ba'i lho rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag cag gis de
18a1(myang 'das): bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la bzhen pa na char rab tu pab ste dus su mo zhi bar bya ba dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor las che bas
18a2(myang 'das): gdungs pa rnams kyang shin tu bsil bar byabyo'o snyam du sems so//gzhan yang klung gAng+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi smos kyi bal glang chen po bral glang gi rgyal po lany+tsa dang /bal
18a3(myang 'das): glang gi rgyal po gser can dang /bal glong gi rgyal po mngar ba'i ro dang /bal gling gi rgyal po mthon mthing mig dang /bel glang gi rgyal po bsung can la sogs pas
18a4(myang 'das): thog mar drangs te/de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la bsti stang byed pa/theg pa chen po la mos pa sha stag ste/de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
18a5(myang 'das): ring po mi thogs par mya ngan las 'da' bar shes pas so so nas pad+mo bzong po chud med dpag tu med pa phyung ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na par lhags nas gdong
18a6(myang 'das): gis phyag btsalnga te phyogs gcig tu sdod ngo do//gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge seng ge sgra zhes bya bas thog mar drangs te sems can
18a7(myang 'das): thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin nas so so nas me tog dang 'bras bu thogs te/sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs
18b1(myang 'das): gcig tu sdod do//gzhan yang klung gAng+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi bya'i rgyal po ngang pa dang /ngur pa dang /rma bya dang /gon dar pa dang /ka lan+ta dang /gu yog dang /ne tso dang //
18b2(myang 'das): kau shi la dang /bA hi ka dang /ka la bi ng+ku dang /'tsho byed la sogs pa bya'i rgyal po rnams kyang so so nas me tog dang /'bras bu thogs te sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas
18b3(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu sdod do//gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi chu klung dang /ba dang lug la sogs pa sangs rgyas gang na bar
18b4(myang 'das): lhags nas grong khyer rtswa mchog gi 'obs dang /shang shong thams cad kyang dri bsung dang ldan pa/kho dog dang ro bro bar ldan pa'i 'o mas kun tu gang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu
18b5(myang 'das): sdod do//gzhan yang klung gang+gA nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyi gling bzhi la gnas pa'i drang srong bzod pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas thog mar drangs te so so na so me tog dang /spos dang /
18b6(myang 'das): 'bras bu mngar ba la sogs pa thogs te/sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor nas bcom ldan
18b7(myang 'das): 'dis la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//de bzhin
19a1(myang 'das): gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung nas bzhes su ma gnang nas drang srong rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te
19a2(myang 'das): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//dzam+bu'i gling gi bung ba'i rgyal po sgra snyan zhes bya bas thog myur drangs nus bung ba thams cad kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs thogs te sangs rgyas gang
19a3(myang 'das): nano bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te lan cig bskor nas phyogs gcig tu sdod do//de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma
19a4(myang 'das): thams cad 'dus te/de la gnyis ma gtogs po ni 'od srungs chen po dang dga' bo'o//gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dang /
19a5(myang 'das): dzam+bu'i gling gi ri lo sogs pa ri rab ri'i rgyal pos thog mar drangs te/ri de dag thams cad kyang shin tu brgyan pa ni nags tshal rgyas pa dang /shing rnams kyi lo ma dang
19a6(myang 'das): yal ga'ang ran par nyi ma'i 'od chod pa dang /me tog rnam pa sna tshogs rgyas pa dang /kho ra khor yug tu 'bab chu dang chu mig yongs su dag cing bsung dang ldan pa dang /lha dang
19a7(myang 'das): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /rig 'dzin dang drang srong la sogs pas rol
19b1(myang 'das): mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur to//rtswa dang drang spyod de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te/sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas/
19b2(myang 'das): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//gzhan yang grangs med pa'i klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi rgya mtsho bzhi'i lha dang /'bab chu kun gyi lha gzi brjid chen po dang ljon pa rdzu 'phrul dang
19b3(myang 'das): ldan pa rnams kyang snga ma bas lhag par mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te/lha rnams kyi lus kyi 'od dang /rol mo'i tshe byad dang /me mar gyis nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang bar byas
19b4(myang 'das): nunas me tog tsam+ba kas klung ha ri be di logs su gtor te/sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe grong
19b5(myang 'das): khyer rtswa mchog gi shing sA la'i tshal thams cad kyang skya bor gyur te/steng gi nam mkha' la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang 'byor dang ri mor ldan pa rgyan gyis mdzes pa
19b6(myang 'das): kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/gzhal med khang gi drung na chu mig dang /rdzing bu dang /mtshe'u las me tog pad+mo skyes pa ni byang gi sgra mi snyan nam/sum
19b7(myang 'das): cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi skyed mis tshal shin tu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang 'dra ba rang byung bar gyur to//de'i tshe na shing sA la'i tshal kun tu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing shAni
20a1(myang 'das): tu yid du 'ong bar gyur to//de'i tshe lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshugs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas yin par
20a2(myang 'das): rig nas thams cad mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te mi dga' bar gyur to//de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i rgyal po dang /brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dag gcog la gcig 'di skad du kye skyes bu
20a3(myang 'das): ngag 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pas mchod pa bshams te de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa la ltos/bdag cag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa
20a4(myang 'das): bya'o//gal te bdag cag gis nang gi tha mar mchod na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur du nges so zhes smras so//de nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyis
20a5(myang 'das): mchod pa snga ma bas shin tu lhag par bshams pa la 'di lta ste/me tog man+dA ra ba dang /men+da rA ba chen po dang /me tog ka tsi li dang /ka tsi li ka chen po dang /me tog many+dzu
20a6(myang 'das): sha ka dang /many+dzu sha ka chen po dang /me tog san+ta ni ka dang /san+ta ni ka chen po dang /me tog yid du 'ong ba dang /yid du 'ong ba chen po dang /me tog kun tu bzang po dang /
20a7(myang 'das): kun tu bzang po chen po dang /me tog dus can dang /dus can chen po dang /me tog bsung gi grong khyer dang /bsung gi grong khyer chen po dang /me tog rab tu dga' ba dang /rab
20b1(myang 'das): rgya dga' ba chen po dang /me tog 'dod ldan dang /'dod ldan chen po dang /me tog bsrung myos dang /bsrung myos chen po dang /me tog kun tu bsung dang /kun tu bsrung chen//
20b2(myang 'das): bopo dang /me tog lha'i gser 'dab dang /me tog k+Sha zhes bya ba dang /shing pa ri tsi tri'i me tog dang /shing ko bi di ra'i me tog dang /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zhal
20b3(myang 'das): zas ro bro ba dang ldan pa thogs te/sangs rgyas gang na bir lhogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te lha rnams kyi 'od kyis nyi zla'i 'od kying zil gyis non to//
20b4(myang 'das): mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar bshams nas de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo //de'i
20b5(myang 'das): tshe lha rnams kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya dran gyis yid gdungos te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lha
20b6(myang 'das): rnams kyis snga ma bas shin tu lhag pa'i mchod po'i yo byang ba shams nas me tog thogs pa'ang snga ma dang 'dra ste/dri bsring gis shin tu ngang pa ni yid du 'ong ba ste/gzhal
20b7(myang 'das): ming khang rgyal bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dang /gzhal mod khang chung ngu'i rnams bshams te/sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag
21a1(myang 'das): btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po la shin tu dad cing mos na de bzhin gshegs
21a2(myang 'das): pas bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo ///
21a3(myang 'das): 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo//bam po gnyis pa//de nas brgya byin dang lha'i 'khor rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas mya ngan gyis yid
21a4(myang 'das): gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi bar du mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa ni rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /
21a5(myang 'das): gdugs gcig pas kyang gcig bzang ba'o//rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang gling bzhi khebs so//ba dan nang gi thung ngu'ang rgya mtsho bzhi 'khor ro//rgyal mtshan
21a6(myang 'das): nang gi dma' ba'ang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnam la reg ste/rlung gis bskyod na sgra skrad snyan pa 'byin pa dang /zhal zas phul du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs bshams nas
21a7(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das gang na bar lhags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
21b1(myang 'das): bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'dri bzhes shig nges gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo //de
21b2(myang 'das): nas lha rnams kyang bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de la gcig ma gtogs pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo ste/tshangs pa'i
21b3(myang 'das): ris kyi lha rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to//de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang /tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od kyis gling bzhi kun snang bar byas nas 'dod pa'i khams na lha
21b4(myang 'das): dang /mI dang /nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi snang bar byas so//de dag kyang so so nas rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs thogs pa ni ba dan nang gi thung ngu'ang
21b5(myang 'das): tshangs pa'i gnas nas shing sA la'i tshil la thug pa thogs nas sangs rgyas gang na par lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das
21b6(myang 'das): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//de bzhin
21b7(myang 'das): gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang ngo //tshangs pa'i lha rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur nas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig
22a1(myang 'das): tu 'khod do//de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris kyang 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas te lhags so//de rnams kyi lus kyi 'od kyang tshangs pa'i lha
22a2(myang 'das): bas kyang lhag par gyur te rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gdugs rnams thogs te/gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang //
22a3(myang 'das): phul du byung ba'i zhal zas mchog rnams thogs nas sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
22a4(myang 'das): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes shig ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cang mi
22a5(myang 'das): gsung bar bzhes su me gnang nas lha ma yin rnams bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe 'dod pa'i khams
22a6(myang 'das): kyi bdud kyi rgyal po bdud sdig to can yang 'khor lha'i bu mo grangs med dpag tu med pa dang bcas te/sems can dmyal ba'i sgo phye nas yongs su bsil zhing dga' ba'i chu
22a7(myang 'das): phab ste/de dag la 'di skad ces bsgo'o//khyed la sogs pa gzhan ci'ang mi nus kyis sems rtse gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
22b1(myang 'das): dran par gyis la mchod pa byed pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig dang /khyed yun ring por rab tu bde bar 'gyur ro//de nas bdud sdig can sems can dmyal ba'i mtshon cha dang /
22b2(myang 'das): sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba'i me rab tu 'bar ba'ang bsil ba'i char gyis zhi bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang 'di snyam du sems bskyed par gyur to//
22b3(myang 'das): thams cad kyis ral gri dang /mnga' gzhu dang /go cha dang mtshon shak+ti dang /lcags kyu dang /lcags tho dang /dgra sta dang /'khor lo dang /zhags pa la sogs te mtshon cha
22b4(myang 'das): thams cad spangs nas mchod pa'i yo byad lha dang mi las khyad par du gyur pa bshams so//gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang stong 'bring po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa thogs nas
22b5(myang 'das): sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag bcol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang
22b6(myang 'das): theg pa chen po la rab tu dad cing mos te theg pa chen po bsrung bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig khe dang grags pa'i phyir ram/gzhan
22b7(myang 'das): skrag par bya ba'i phyir ram/gzhan la brdzun bya ba'i phyir ram/nor dang zang zing gi phyir ram/gzhan gyi yid dang sbyor ba tsam gyi phyir theg pa chen po 'di 'dzin par byed na//
23a1(myang 'das): bden yang rung brdzun yang rung bdag cag gis de'i tshe gang zag de'i 'jigs pa bsal ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di 'bul lo//rgyog+sa /twA ta la tog kyi/
23a2(myang 'das): ha le/ma hA lo ha le/a la tsa la ta la swA hA/sngags 'dis ni sems stor ba rnams dang /'jigs skrag pa dang /chos smra ba dang /yang dag pa'i chos kyi bar du mi gcod pa
23a3(myang 'das): dang /mu stegs can 'dul ba dang /bdag gi lus bsrung ba dang /yang dag pa'i chos bsrung ba dang /theg pa chen po bsrung ba'i slad du gsang sngags 'di 'bul lo//
23a4(myang 'das): gang gis gsang sngags 'di yid la bgyid na bal glang rmis pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/gal te 'brog dgon pa 'am/yul sa stong pa bag tsha ba'i gnas su mchis
23a5(myang 'das): na'ang 'jigs par mi 'gyur/chu dang me dang /seng ge dang /stag dang /spyang ki dang /dgras 'jigs pa dang /rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa las kyang thar bar
23a6(myang 'das): 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gang gis gsang sngags 'di yid la bgyid na 'jigs pa de dag la sogs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das
23a7(myang 'das): gsang sngags 'di 'dzin pa la bdag cag gis bskyab cing sba ba ni ji ltar rus sbal yan lag drug sbed pa bzhin no//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag g.yo dang sgyus
23b1(myang 'das): 'di skad du smra ba ma lags kyi gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa la bdag cag gis mthu stobs btang ngo //bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa nang
23b2(myang 'das): gi tha ma 'di bzhes su gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyed kyis mchod pa zhal zas phul ba rnams ni mi bzhes
23b3(myang 'das): so//'gro ba thams cad dang 'khor rnam bzhi la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di bzhes so zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar gzhan ni bzhes su ma gnang
23b4(myang 'das): ngo//de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang bzhes su ma gnang nas bdud sdig to can bsams pa bzhin du ma gyur pas mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
23b5(myang 'das): de'i tshe lha dbang sgyur chen po'ang 'khor lha grangs med dpag tu med pa dang bcas te/mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa 'ong tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang /'jig rten gyi mgon
23b6(myang 'das): po bzhi dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin sde brgyad dang /mi ma yin la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnams zil gyis gnon pa ni ji ltar sol ba'i drung na shel bzhag
23b7(myang 'das): pa dang 'dra ste thams cad mi snang bar gyur to//rin po che'i gdugs nang gi chung ngu'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su khebs pa'i mchod pa'i yo
24a1(myang 'das): byad la sogs pa thogs te/sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas lan grangs med pa bskor nas bcom
24a2(myang 'das): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mchod pa'i yo byad nang gi tha ma 'di 'bul po ni ji ltar na bdag cag la sbrang bus mchod pa 'bul
24a3(myang 'das): ba'am/chu snyim pa gang rgya mtsho chen por blug pa 'am/maM mar chung ngu gcig gi 'od kyis nyi ma brgya stong la btang ba 'am/dbyar me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dus su me tog
24a4(myang 'das): gcig thogs te me tog mang po'i khrod du bzhag pa 'am/yungs kar 'brum bu gcig tsam ri rab ri'i rgyal po la bstengs ni rgya mtsho dang nyi ma dang /me tog mang po dang /
24a5(myang 'das): rab la mi sman pa dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi mchod pa'ong de dang 'dra'o//gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spos dang /me tog
24a6(myang 'das): dang /rol mo dang /ba dan dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su bkang ste/mchod kyang smos pa'i rin du mi 'tshal to//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de bzhin
24a7(myang 'das): gshegs pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i slad du sems can dmyal ba dang /yi dgas dang /byol song gi skye gnas su sdug bsngal mang po len to//de bas na bcom ldan 'das bdag
24b1(myang 'das): cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod pa 'di dag bzhes shig ces gsol to//de'i tshe 'di nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams klung gang+gA'i bye ma grangs med dpag tu med pa 'das
24b2(myang 'das): pa'i pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/
24b3(myang 'das): mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten rig pa/bla na med pa/skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
24b4(myang 'das): 'das bzhugs te/de'i tshe na sangs rgyas des nye gnas chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod song la 'di nas nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces
24b5(myang 'das): bya ba na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten
24b6(myang 'das): rig pa/bla na med pa/skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'o//
24b7(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i zhal zas bsung can dri shin tu zhim pa/yid du 'ong zhing bde bar 'gyur ba 'di thogs te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phul
25a1(myang 'das): cig/bcom ldan 'das de gsol nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs so//rigs kyi bu khyod de la phyag 'tshal zhing the tshom du gyur pa'ang zhu
25a2(myang 'das): ba'i dus la bab bo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'dug pa las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal
25a3(myang 'das): telan gsum bskor nus byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gdo na ba der dong ngo //
25a4(myang 'das): de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas 'khor gyi nang na tshangs pa dang /brgya byin dang /phyogs bzhi'i mgon po dang /bdud
25a5(myang 'das): sdig to can dang /dbang sgyur chen po la sogs pa de dag gis sa g.yas pa mthong nas lus spyi bung zhes byed de lce'ang skams pa tsam du dngos skrag par gyur te/so sor 'gro bar
25a6(myang 'das): ches nas lus kyi 'od dang gzi brjid kyang mi snang bar gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa las langs te/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la 'di skad
25a7(myang 'das): ces smras so//rigs kyi bu dag khyed 'jigs par ma byed cig/khyed ma 'jigs shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di nas shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams klung gang+gA'i bye ma
25b1(myang 'das): grangs med dpag tu meng ba 'das pa'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
25b2(myang 'das): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa bzhugs te/de na byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'khor byang chub
25b3(myang 'das): sems dpa' grangs med pa dang bcas te/'jig rten gyi khams 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa lnga mchod du 'ong bas byang chub sems dpa' de'i gzi brjid dang byin gyis
25b4(myang 'das): khyed kyi lus kyi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to//de bas na khyed ma 'jigs par shin tu dga' ba skyed cig/de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyis rgyang ma
25b5(myang 'das): nas sangs rgyas de dang /'khor mang po rnams mthong ba ni ji ltar me long gsal ba'i nang na bdag gi gzugs brnyan mthong ba bzhin no//de nas yang 'jam dpal gyis 'khor
25b6(myang 'das): mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//khyed kyis sangs rgyas de mthong ba ni ji ltar sangs rgyas 'di mthong ba dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis gzhan yang sangs rgyas
25b7(myang 'das): phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa dpag tu med pa snyed kyang mthong bar gyur to//de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang pos gcig la gcig 'di skad du kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten stongs
26a1(myang 'das): so//'jig rten stongs so//de bzhin gshegs pa ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras so//de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang
26a2(myang 'das): po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ba ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' de'i ba spu'i khung bu re re nas me tog pad+mo
26a3(myang 'das): chen po re re byung la pad+mo do re re'i steng yang grong khyer bdun khri brgyad stong snyed yod do//grong khyer de'ang chu zheng gab par grong khyer yangs pa can dang mnyam ste/ra ba dang 'obs
26a4(myang 'das): kyang rin po che sna bdun gyis spras la rin po che'i shing tA la rim pa bdun dang ra ba/de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyang rab tu bde zhing skyid pa/grong khyer de'i cog par yang
26a5(myang 'das): dzam+bu chu klung gi gser las byas pa/cog par de re re'i bar na rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs yod de me tog dang 'bras bu shin tu rgyas pa/rlung mi drag pas bskyod
26a6(myang 'das): pa na sgra skad shin tu snyan pa ni ji ltar lha'i rol mo zer ba lta bu de na gnas pa'i me dag gis thos ni phul du byung ba'i bar du bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro//'obs kyi nang na'ang yongs
26a7(myang 'das): su dge ba'i chu bsung can bai DUr+ya dang 'dra bas yongs su gang ngo //chu de dag la rin po che sna bdun gyi gru yod do//gru'i steng na mi dag rtsa zhing khrus byed de gcig la gcig
26b1(myang 'das): dga' zhing rab tu bde ba myong ngo //gzhan yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi pad+mo skye ba ni ut+pa la dang /ku mu da dang /pad+mo dang /puN+Da ri ka la sogs pa shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam
26b2(myang 'das): skye'o//'obs kyi g.yas g.yon na skyed mos tshal mang du yod de skyed mos tshal de re re'i nang du'ang chu mig dang bcas pa'i rdzing bu lnga lnga yod do//rdzing bu de dag gi nang na
26b3(myang 'das): yang me tog ut+pal dang /ku mud dang /pad+ma dang /pud+d+ha rika che khyod shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam skyes te dri bsung shin tu mang ba/rab tu yid du 'ong ba/chu shin tu gsal zhing
26b4(myang 'das): 'jam pa/ngang pa dang /ngur pa la sogs pa rkyal zhing rtse ba/skyed mos tshal de na gzhan yang rin po che'i gzhal med khang yod de/gzhal med khang de re re'i yang chu zheng gab
26b5(myang 'das): par dpag tshad bzhi yod do//gzhal med khang de'i ra ba'ang rin po che sna bzhi las byas so//'di lta ste gser dang /dngul dang baiDUr+ya dang /shel las byas te kha bad kyang gser
26b6(myang 'das): las byas/sa gzhi ni mu sa la gar+b+ha las blangs te gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/gzhal med khang de'i drung na rin po che sna bdun gyi 'bab tshu dang /chu mig dang /rdzing bu yod de/rdzing
26b7(myang 'das): bu de ro re la'ang gser gyi tham skas bco brgyad bco brgyad yod do//chu zheng yang dzam+bu chu klung gi gser las byas te/sum cu rtsa gsum gnas gyi skyed mos tshal rab tu bde ba
27a1(myang 'das): can dang 'dra'o//grong khyer de re re'i nang na'ang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod do//rgyal po de ra re la'ang btsun mo dang po brang gi sgras grangs med pa yod du//
27a2(myang 'das): de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga'o//don gnas pa'i mi thams cad kyang so so'i gnas nA rtse zhing dga'o//de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni rna bar gzhan ma grag gi bla/
27a3(myang 'das): na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i sgra 'ba' zhig grag go/me tog de re re'i nang la'ang seng ge'i khri re re yod de/khri de'i rkang pa bzhi'ang bai DUr+ya mthon mthing la byas pa/khams
27a4(myang 'das): gsum las 'das pa'i na bza' shin tu 'jam pa dkar po bting ngo //khrid re re'i steng na rgyal po re re 'dug ste theg pa chen po'i chos kyis sems can rnams 'dul te/de la'ang
27a5(myang 'das): sems can la la ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /'chang ba dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /'don pa dang /ji ltar smras pa bzhin du nan tan
27a6(myang 'das): du byed pa dang /shin tu rgyas pa'i bar du byed do//de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa des bdag gi lus la sems can tshad med pa snyed bkod pa de'ang
27a7(myang 'das): 'jig rten gyi bde ba btang nas thams cad 'di skad du kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten stongs so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po ma lon par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smra'o///
27b1(myang 'das): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshad med pa snyed kyis bskor te/de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bstan nas mchod pa'i yo byad tshad
27b2(myang 'das): med pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /zhal zas bsung can thogs te/gang zhig la zhal zas ngo'i bsung gis rog na kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro//byang
27b3(myang 'das): chub sems dpa' de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzu 'phrul de dag mthong bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa ni lus chen po dpag tu
27b4(myang 'das): med de de nam mkha' dong mnyam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par gzhan gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi mtha' shes par nus pa med do//de'i
27b5(myang 'das): tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas lhag par bshams nas sangs rgyas gang na bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
27b6(myang 'das): zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te thal mo sbyar bsti stang dang bcas nas bcom ldan 'das le 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du mchod
27b7(myang 'das): pa 'di dag bo zhes shig ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen pas cad mi gsung bar bzhes su ma gnang nas byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa 'khor
28a1(myang 'das): dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas byang chub sems dpa' lus dpag tu med pa grangs
28a2(myang 'das): med pa snyed kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma bas lhag par bshams nas sangs rgyas gang no bar lhags pa nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du rgyas par rig par bya'o//de'i tshe/
28a3(myang 'das): shing sA la'i drung gnyis kyi bar bsod nams kyi sa gzhi bkra shis kyi gnas dor kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis so stongs cung
28a4(myang 'das): zad kyang med par yongs su gang ngo //de'i tshe phyogs bzhi nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas te 'dug pa'i gnas ni srung gi rtse mo 'am/khab kyi rtse mo tsam
28a5(myang 'das): mam/rdul phra mo tsam mo//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'dus par gyur to/dzam+bu'i
28a6(myang 'das): gling na gnas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang 'dus par gyur te/de la gnyis ma gtogs pa ni 'od srungs chen po dang dga' bo'o//rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
28a7(myang 'das): sbrul gdug pa bltas pa tsam gyis 'chi bar byed pa dang /sbur ba dang /za gdug dang /sdig pa'i bar du sdig pa can gyi las spyod pa rnam po bcu drug po ma gtogs par gzhan
28b1(myang 'das): thams cad 'dus par gyur to//srin bo ngan pa dang /lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad kyis sdig pa'i bsam pa btang nas gcig la gcig byams shing sdug pa'i sems bskyed pa/
28b2(myang 'das): na pha 'am/ma'am/phu nu lta bur gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems
28b3(myang 'das): bskyed de gcig ma gtogs pa ni lag sred can no//de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sa gzhi thams cad kyang 'jam par
28b4(myang 'das): gyur te ngam grog dang /bye ma dang /gseg ma dang /rdo ba dang /shing tsher ma can dang /rtswa gdug pa'ang med par gyur te rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa ni nub
28b5(myang 'das): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpog tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang 'dra bar gyur to//de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
28b6(myang 'das): khams rdul phra mo snyed shin tu snang ba ni ji ltar me long gsal ba'i nang na bdag gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od rnam pa lnga/
28b7(myang 'das): byung ste 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ming po snang bar byas nas de dag gi lus kyi 'od zer mi mngon par zil gyis mnan te bya ba byas nas phyir zhal gyi sgor zhugs so//de'i tshe lha dang mi dang /
29a1(myang 'das): lha ma yin la sogs pa 'khor rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer phyir yang zhal gyi sgor zhugs pa mthong nas thams cad 'jigs skrag ste lus kyi ba spu kun kyang
29a2(myang 'das): langs nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas 'od zer bkye nas slar zhugs pa 'di ni rgyu med pa'am/rkyen med pa ma yin te/phyogs bcur mdzad pa kun mdzad
29a3(myang 'das): nas tha ma yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ltas yin du nges so//kyi hud kyi hud de bzhin gshegs pas tshad med pa bzhi'i thugs btang nas lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa'ang
29a4(myang 'das): bzhes su ma gnang ngo //deng slan chad ni ye shes kyi nyi ma'ang nub par gyur/bla na med pa'i chos kyi gru'ang bying bar gyur to//kyi hud re sdug 'jig rten sdug bsngal chen pos
29a5(myang 'das): gdungs par gyur to zhes smras nas brang la khu tshur gyis rdeg cing tshe nge 'den pas lus kyis mi bzod pa tsam du shin tu 'dar te ba spu'i khung bu kun nas khrag kyang zags par gyur
29a6(myang 'das): to//de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na grong khyer rtswa mchog gi shing mkhan gyi bu dge bsnyen tsun+da zhes bya ba ris mthun pa'i 'khor lnga bcu dang lhan cig tu 'dus so//des 'jig
29a7(myang 'das): rten du bcas pa dag dge ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi tshul btang nas 'dug pa las langs te/bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
29b1(myang 'das): btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar mchi ma blags te/sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
29b2(myang 'das): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bdag cag gis mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes su gsol/de'ang sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bsgral ba'i slad
29b3(myang 'das): du'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dang slan chad mgon ma mchis/skyabs ma mchis/dpung gnyen ma mchis rten ma mchis gnas ma mchis te/shin tu dbul phongs
29b4(myang 'das): pas de bzhin gshegs pa la slad ma ma mchis pa'i dus kyi tshogs tsam zhig gsol lo//bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi mchod pa tha ma 'di bzhes
29b5(myang 'das): nas gdod yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su gsol/bcom ldan 'das dper na rgyal rigs sam/bram ze'am/gdol pa'ang rung dbul phongs pas
29b6(myang 'das): yul gzhan du mchis te zhing gi las la zhugs nas rmon pa dul ba dang /zhing yang gshin la sa gzhi'ang mnyam pa dang /gseg ma dang zhing gi ngo yur ma mchis
29b7(myang 'das): na dgung char 'ba' zhig la re'o//bcom ldan 'das rmon pa dul ba zhes bgyi ba ni lus dang ngag gi las bdun po'i dpe'o//zhing gshin las gzhi mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba ni/
30a1(myang 'das): shes rab kyi dpe'o//gseg ma dang zhing gi ngo yur ma mchis pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dpe'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la'ang rmon pa dul ba dang /
30a2(myang 'das): zhing gshin pa'ang mchis la zhing gi ngo yur ma bsal na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi char 'ba' zhig la re'o//rigs dbul po bzhi ni bdag lags te bdag ni
30a3(myang 'das): bla na med pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi rin po ches dbul te phongs na thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi dbul phongs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal zhing sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gdungs
30a4(myang 'das): pa'i sems can tshad ma mchis pa bsgral du gsol/bdag cag gi mchod pa 'di shin tu chung mod kyi 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po kun gyi bsod snyoms su 'tshal
30a5(myang 'das): na bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la mgon ma mchis/skyabs ma mchis/dpung gnyen ma mchis na sgra gcan 'dzin lta bur thugs brtse bar dgongs su gsol/de nas bcom
30a6(myang 'das): ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/bla na med pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur bas tsun+da la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//legs so legs so//ngas khyod kyi dbul phongs
30a7(myang 'das): pa med pa dang bla na med pa'i chos kyi char lus la dbab cing chos kyi myu gu skye bar bya'o//khyod ni da ltar tshe dang /mdog dang /stobs dang /bde ba dang /thogs pa med pa'i
30b1(myang 'das): so sor yang dag par shes pa thob par 'dod de/ngas khyod la tshe dang /mdog dang /stobs dang /bde ba dang thogs pa med pa'i so sor yang dag par shes pa rtag tu sbyin no//de ci'i
30b2(myang 'das): phyir zhe na/tsun+da zas kyi sbyin pa byin pas khyad par med pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis thob par 'gyur ro//gnyis gang zhe na/bzhes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
30b3(myang 'das): thob pa dang /bzhes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'o//ngas kyang khyod kyi mchod pa nang gi tha ma 'di bzhes pas khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
30b4(myang 'das): gyur to//de nas tsun+d+ras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar sbyin pa byin pa 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis khyad par ma mchis so zhes
30b5(myang 'das): bgyi ba de ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/sngar sbyin pa bzhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'ang mang bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur/sems
30b6(myang 'das): can gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bgyid pa'ang ma lags so//sbyin pa byin pa slad kyis bzhes pa ni nyon mongs pa'ang bas par gyur la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang
30b7(myang 'das): yongs su rdzogs shing sems can gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags so//sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni sems can no//sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni
31a1(myang 'das): lha'i lha'o//sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni zas dang 'dres pa'i lus/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i lus/thub can gyi lus/mi rtag pa'i lus so//sbyin pa phyis
31a2(myang 'das): bzhes pa ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i sku rdo rje lta bu'i sku chos kyi sku/rtag pa'i sku/mtha' yas pa'i sku lags na ci'i slad du sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par
31a3(myang 'das): ma mchis zhes gsungs/sngar sbyin pa blangs pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par
31a4(myang 'das): mi 'gyur te/sha'i mig 'ba' zhig thob kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan mi thob pa nas shes rab kyi spyan gyi bar du thob pa ma lags so//sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
31a5(myang 'das): pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs la sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan pa nas shes rab kyi spyan gyi bar du ldan pa logs na ci'i slad du
31a6(myang 'das): sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis zhes gsungs/bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa sngar blangs pa ni blangs ma thag tu 'tshal nas de ma thag tu zhu bas tshe dang mdog
31a7(myang 'das): dong /stobs dang bde ba dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa lags so//sbyin pa phyis bzhes pa ni gsol ba dang zhu ba'ang ma mchis la 'bras bu rnam pa lnga po'ang
31b1(myang 'das): ma mchis na ci'i slad du sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par ma mchis zhes gsungs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal
31b2(myang 'das): ba tshad med mtha' yas grangs med pa'i bar du zas sam nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sku ma yin/nang gi tha ma'i sku ma yin te/rtag pa'i sku/chos kyi sku/rdo rje'i sku'o//
31b3(myang 'das): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ma mthong ba ni nyon mongs pa'i lus/zas dang bcas pa'i lus nang gi tha ma'i lus so//byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe bsod snyoms bzhes nas
31b4(myang 'das): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bsod snyoms zhu ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
31b5(myang 'das): par sangs rgyas te/de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par med do zhes ngas gsungs so//byang chub sems dpa' thog ma'ang bdud bzhi bcom la/da mya ngan
31b6(myang 'das): las 'da' kar yang bdud rnam bzhi bcom pas de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu khyad par med do zhes ngas gsungs so//byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe na mdo sde
31b7(myang 'das): bcu gnyis rgyas par ma gsungs mod kyi/thams cad sngar thugs su chud la nga mya ngan las 'da' kar sems can rnams la rgyas par phye zhing bstan pas de bas na sbyin pa rnam pa
32a1(myang 'das): gnyis la khyad par med do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bskal pa tshad med blangs med pa'i bar du bsod snyoms mi gsol mod kyi nyan thos rnams/
32a2(myang 'das): la 'di skad ces gsungs te/ston de bzhin gshegs pas gnag rdzi mo nan+ta dang /nan+ta pa la gnyis kyis 'o ma'i 'jam phul ba bzhes nas gdod bla na med pa yang dag par
32a3(myang 'das): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//ngan yang dag par bshos mi gsol te/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'di dag gi phyir khyod kyi mchod pa tha ma
32a4(myang 'das): 'di bzhes mod kyi/yang dag par na gsol ba med do//de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis tsun+da'i mchod pa bzhes pa mthong nas thams cad dga'
32a5(myang 'das): mgu rangs te smad mthun pas tsun+da la legs so//shin tu legs so zhes smras te/khyod kyi ming btags pa thog tu bab bo//tsun+da zhes bya ba ni don dam pa la mkhas pa ste/khyong
32a6(myang 'das): kyi kyang deng 'dir don chen po brtsams pas de bas na ngan lngas ming tsun+d+ra zhes btags te/khyod kyis ni tshe 'di nyid la grags pa dang phan pa'i don chen po thob cing smon pa'ang
32a7(myang 'das): yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ngo mtshar che'o//tsun+da mi'i nang du skyes kyang bla na med pa'i bde ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba thob bo//legs so//tsun+da me tog u~M dum+ba ra ltar
32b1(myang 'das): 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa ste/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa'ang shin tu rnyed dka' la/sangs rgyas dang phrad nas dad pa skyed pa'ang shin tu dka'/chos thos pa'ang
32b2(myang 'das): shin tu dka'/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' kar mchod pa bshams te 'bul ba'ang shin tu dka'o//tsun+da la phyagro 'tshal lo//tsun+da la phyag 'tshal lo//khyod
32b3(myang 'das): ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs te/ston gyi tshes bco lnga'i zla ba ltar rgyas shing yongs su dag la/sprin nam ne bun gyis mchod na thams cad kyis blta ba dang 'dra
32b4(myang 'das): bar khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar bdag cag la sogs pas shin tu blta bar gyur to//khyod kyi mchod pa nang gi tha ma bzhes pas khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
32b5(myang 'das): gyur to/tsun+da khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//de bas na khyod ni zla ba yongs su rgyas pa dang 'dra ste/sems can gang yang mi lta ba med do//tsun+da khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//mi'i lus thob
